tool.name: ToolFullSpeciesMapping
tool.summary: Use this tool whenever you are interested in seeing all of the spatial data available in the KBA-EBAR database for a given species. For example, you should use this tool when trying to answer the question: “Where is species X found?” or when preparing spatial data for trigger species ahead of workshops. The tool creates a single group layer for your full species of interest, making sure to also include any data that was identified to infraspecies.
